item.title: Introducing Jaded Blog
item.description: Welcome to Jaded Blog, the official source for all status updates to jadedgamer. From now on, I’ll be posting information on new releases…
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Jaded Blog, the official source for all status updates to jadedgamer. From now on, I’ll be posting information on new releases, documentation changes, and general updates here. Stay tuned for the next post on some new featues coming to the site!
